alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kit Carson County; Yuma (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 18 at 2:44AM MDT until April 19 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 013, 027, 079, 252, 253, AND 254... The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 252, 253, and 254.Fire weather zones 001, 013, and 027.Fire weather zone 079. * WIND...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 10%. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Look for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings. Take notice of any local burn bans.
